website_summaries.verdict: Propel yourself confidently with this ultralight carbon fiber paddle.
pros: Fight fatigue and wear with one of the lightest paddles on the market
Shaft is made from 3K carbon fiber while the blade is nylon
The 3-piece design and rugged paddle bag permit easy storage, and the paddle is adjustable from 72 to 86 inches
cons: The adhesive on the adjustment clamp used may need reapplication after several uses

customer_reviews.title: I liked this paddle so much that I bought two of ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in Hawaii and do lot of paddling. I've owned other carbon fiber paddles, aluminum ones, etc. The 3 segments makes it easier to transport and store and the paddles are extremely light, more so than other carbon fiber paddles that I had owned in the past. I liked this paddle so much that I bought two of them, in case my friends want to go paddling with me. Highly recommend. One caveat is that the middle button does corrode with extended use in salt water, so be sure to wash it out really well or buy them separately from a hardware vendor if it does end up breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Eu D. Yang

customer_reviews.title: this would be a excellent paddle. But sadly
customer_reviews.text: If the paddle component were not negatively bouyant, this would be a excellent paddle. But sadly, I'm highly unimpressed that a watersport item such as this does not float. My nephew accidentally dropped the paddle in open water and it sunk with impossible recovery. I'd consider this a significant design flaw. Other brands such as Aqua Marina float. Is purchasing just the paddle part even possible?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blade bubbling after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great paddle, but the blade is bubbling up for some reason and I’ve only had the paddle for a couple months which I wouldn’t expect from a paddle at this price point. I also had some of the carbon fiber peel off where the shaft connects to the handle which has made the paddle twist/rock in the handle when I take strokes.
customer_reviews.author: David Cz

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT Float!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional paddle perfect for a paddleboard. Unfortunately the description is inaccurate because it does NOT Float!!!. I saw my money sink to the bottom of the lake. Then I had to hand paddle bake to shore.
customer_reviews.author: parkerbored

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid paddle. Not the slightest wobble -- transfers all energy from the stroke into propelling the board. Ergonomic handle. Do carry a phillips head screw driver or a multi-tool in your kit, in case the screws that hold the clamp on the top eventually loosen. There is blue threadlock visibly applied to those bolts by the manufacturer to prevent loosening, but I can see how that may eventually become an issue, as some reviewers pointed out. If that happens, it will be an easy fix (just don't over-tighten any carbon fiber tubes so they don't crack).
customer_reviews.author: gh

customer_reviews.title: SUP all day
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this paddle is great! Recently got into SUP and the wood paddle caught my attention. I'm very thankful it did! The paddle is super light, easy to put together, easy to transport in its perfectly sized case. You know how when you have a really nice piece of equipment it somehow makes you perform better even if it does the same thing? This paddle definitely has that. I'm not sure if I'm padding any better but damn does it feel nice to use it in the water. The only gotcha I would say is the angle is very aggressive. Definitely go on YouTube and look at proper paddleboarding technique so that you can use this effectively
customer_reviews.author: Eloy

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle but....
customer_reviews.text: I bought the elite 2k carbon paddle with bamboo veneer. Its a lightweight paddle but i have lighter carbon paddles. The craftmanship is good. The paddle is gorgeous. But, its trisectional. It has slop in it the keyed upper section has to be tighter real tight to keep the handle from twisting the small amount it has the ability to. At this price point i expect a keyed section to fit tighter. The lower section has enough slop to bend back and forth slightly with each stroke. Again, at his price point and with a description of Elite i expect zero slop and movement. I fixed this lower movement with a small amount of thin tape under the middle section.
customer_reviews.author: William Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw - check for crack at upper clamp before using
customer_reviews.text: I returned one my first one of these after finding a crack on the shaft in the gap at the upper clamp. Ordered another and checked the same spot. It was not cracked, but there was a slide indentation, like they had cut away the clamp material and cut into the shaft a bit. After I slightly flexed, it cracked in the same spot. Returned--trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle, misleading titles
customer_reviews.text: So was looking for a carbon fiber replacement paddle. The headline to this paddle was : Carbon Fiber SUP Paddle - 3-Piece Adjustable Stand Up Paddleboard Paddles - Carbon Fiber Series To be fair if I had paid closer attention reading on down below it was listed as an alloy paddle, but to list an aluminum paddle under this title is very misleading. The paddle itself is good, though where the paddle attaches to the base of the pole is black sealing tape. I have to question whether this will last but otherwise for an ALUMINUM paddle this seems to be a good paddle.
customer_reviews.author: R. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Engineers must revise the clamp in order for this product to be useful.
customer_reviews.text: The carbon fiber Paddle and handle Are gorgeous however the engineers Blew it on the clamp. There are serious flaws in the clamp design that allow you to adjust the telescoping paddle length. Within the nylon clamp there is a small tab that is supposed to keep the Shaft of The paddle handle from rotating within the shaft of the paddle. Due to the poor Engineering the clamp will loosen after 10 minutes of paddling. The Engineers must revise the clamp in order for this product to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H. Florman, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and dependable!
customer_reviews.text: This paddle has been used several times since I purchased it and it has worked flawlessly. The paddle shape is comfortable to use on long outings and I didn't experience any bending in the shaft. I weigh about 200lbs, and the paddle that came with my board bent in half with the force I was using, but no issues with this one at all. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andyman

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever bought. Yes it seemed like it would nice until I realized the inside shaft was round with of course will not stay tight. Also, the first time my wife used it she had to turn around and come back to get her old paddle because it cracked all the way up the shaft starting at the release button. It would be a great product if it wasn’t made so cheaply. Do not buy this product it is a piece of junk. You would be better off buying one at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Myers-shepard

customer_reviews.title: Overall product was manufactured well and as advertised. However ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall product was manufactured well and as advertised. However, the lower shaft connection (with spring detent) was a much sloppier fit than reviewed by others. The main reason I selected this particular paddle was because that assembly point was reviewed as very rigid. That is not the case. Made some slight modifications to tighten that fit, hopefully it will remain that way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A company that actually stands behind their product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a carbon-fiber paddle for my wife as a Christmas present. She opened it on Christmas morning and unfortunately, one of the interlocking sections had shattered! My guess is that someone stepped on it, or something ran over the end of the paddle section. I contacted the manufacture, expecting a hassle but, to my pleasant surprise, the company said that I could order a new one at no charge!!! That is what I call fantastic customer service!!! (I also will be very cautious not to step on the inter-connecting ends of the paddle!)
customer_reviews.author: CPA - Salem

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I had to tighten the screws right out of the start! It is advertised to come with a bag and no bag was included!!!!
customer_reviews.author: haleyj

customer_reviews.title: It floats!
customer_reviews.text: After my kids lost two paddles, I knew I needed to get a paddle that floats. It is amazing how many paddles don't float. This paddle is unbelievably light, but still robust. The paddle has a sealed upper chamber (plastic plug sealing off upper tube) and closed cell foam in the very bottom of the lower tube. My family and I have used this paddle for the whole season and we stilll have it!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Mehan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nicely Made
customer_reviews.text: I love this paddle. It is strong and very nicely made, light and well thought-out. Beautiful to look at with the spread-toe fabric. Hardware works well, sleeves fit perfectly and even the handle is molded carbon. The blade is slender and light, just right for medium sized paddler, and the handle end of the shaft is grooved to keep the handle aligned with the blade. This is only a few ounces heavier than the most expensive paddles, and it is half the price and better looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I find this paddle excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I only have experience with one other paddle, which cost a bit more than twice the price of this one... Compared to the more expensive paddle, this one is quite a bit heavier. No matter, if you are a casual paddler. If you plan to paddle for distance or race, you might want to spend more on something lighter. Otherwise I find this paddle excellent for the price. Easy to assemble. Feels secure and solid when paddling. Adjustment mechanism works well and also feel secure.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: very deceiving
customer_reviews.text: when I made the choice for the price I did not noticed that the item description changed sometime during check out, from a carbon fiber with no bag to an alloy with bag for the same price so the change did not get noticed and as well the bag was not shipped.I could have saved money just ordering the alloy one like I received. I do not understand how Amazon would allow such dirty work. I will remove myself from the Amazon prime as to not pay extra for tricks such as this. Good luck to all.
customer_reviews.author: sad/mad customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware: This product is advertised as a Carbon Fiber Paddle, it doesn't contain Carbon Fiber at all!
customer_reviews.text: Heads-Up! The headline for this product indicates you're buying a Carbon Fiber SUP Paddle from this company's Carbon Fiber Series but BEWARE, THERE IS NO CARBON FIBER IN THIS PADDLE. I don't understand why they're allowed to mislead Amazon customers but they are, and they're getting away with it. Returning the cheap alloy paddle sent to me instead of the carbon fiber paddle I thought I was ordering. Class act👍
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: Paddle section DOES NOT float!
customer_reviews.text: In general, this is a good SUP paddle; however, we just learned the hard way that if the handle and the paddle sections accidentally become separated that the paddle section DOES NOT float (the handle section does still). If anyone needs a paddle section only, you can find one about 25 feet down in Lake Tahoe!
customer_reviews.author: CandyB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice paddles! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I left the paddles that came with my 2 inflateable SUPs leaning against a tree at Pennekamp State Park and they were gone when I went back to find them. I came across these while looking for a reasonably priced replacement. I am very pleased with them. They are lighter than the and much more simple to adjust than the previous ones. The bag is a nice extra. I am a recreational paddler and I can't tell any difference in the paddling efficiency. Definitely a great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: klrman

customer_reviews.title: I strongly recommend this effectively-engineered and affordable paddle.
customer_reviews.text: Received my paddle ahead of schedule and well packed. Everything is great! I've taken it out twice, and the configuration works perfectly. Although feather-light, the paddle handles even powerful strokes with no flex at the joints at all. Perfectly rigid paddle. Tighten the screws on the clamp gently after the clamp is closed, tighten enough, but don't over tighten. Because the clamp is nice and broad, it doesn't need to be to be crazy tight to hold very well.
customer_reviews.author: Podzol

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce!
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight, easy to put together, it looks good too! I have a different paddle that came with a Paddleboard bundle I got and that one’s quite heavy. As far as how it is in the water, I’ll update this review once I’ve put it to use!
customer_reviews.author: Momx2

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $
customer_reviews.text: Paddles are solidly built, assemble easy, and not heavy. Not as light as carbon but the fiberglass is a good compromise on price if you are only out on the water periodically (1-2x per week). If I was paddling mroe often for longer periods I woudl go with carbon. Best part is I can break down teh paddle and put it in my car/truck and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE!  HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!!
customer_reviews.text: 5 minutes into paddling on the lake for the FIRST USE, the paddle end slid right offthe 8" insert that it is supposed to be permanently glued to. The paddle immediately sunk. All I had left was the pol and handle in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PADDLE AND EVEN GOT COMPLIMENTS FROM THE SUP TEACHER when I went for my first lesson!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even got compliments from the SUP teacher when I brought it to class!!!! Felt very sturdy and easy to snap together. NO FLEAMSY HERE.. I felt great being out for my FIRST TIME and knowing what to do! Even better was I got a PERSONAL email from the owners of the company to make sure I liked the product and if I didn't .. they would personally answer any questions I have! Awesome.. I LOVE SUPPORTING A SMALL FAMILY BUSINESS!!!!!!!!!!!! Please post that for others who like to do the same.. I think that would mean more to the person buying it.. at least it would have for me..
customer_reviews.author: VitaGirl

customer_reviews.title: they have worked great so far
customer_reviews.text: Got a SUP a couple months back and got these paddles. I have no complaints, they have worked great so far. They break down into a little bag and are easy to take apart. You do need a screw driver for the top handle in order to secure it, but that's not really a big deal. Try to keep it clean after use. If you get sand in the shafts it will be very hard to put together and take apart. Overall, this paddle is very sturdy, barely any bend when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a paddle that didn’t break the bank to replace an aluminum chipped paddle. At first out of the box the handle felt like cheat plastic. It’s easy to put together and I like the locking pin for adjusting the total length. It works great on the water, but I know a really good fiberglass paddle feels lighter. Overall it’s a good paddle for the price.
customer_reviews.author: HRN

customer_reviews.title: Everything works.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with each piece individually wrapped. Email arrived from their customer service almost at same time with contact info. Used for first time today. You might want to check clamping screws after use as mine had loosened from my original tightening but they never slipped after 4 miles of paddling in bay. A1 customer service but I thankfully haven't needed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Speck

customer_reviews.title: Up Creek without a firm Paddle
customer_reviews.text: This paddle has a design flaw with the "clamp." The construction of the clamp is a polymer with 2ea stainless steel bolts. There is no method to apply the needed force to anchor the telescoping portion of handle in place. You'll either crack the polymer construction or deal with a collapsible handle. The overall design and weight is nice. Should've upgraded the quality of the clasp parts. Sawyer & Airhead paddles are Awesome upgrades! Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: This Super Paddle is super!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made Carbon Fiber paddle for the price of aluminum. The infinitely adjustable paddle handle is a joy to work with. No more push pins to fool with and get bound up with sand or salt. Components fit together perfectly with no wiggle or wobble. The clamp works super well and places the handle exactly where you want it. An extra bonus is the carrying case the paddle come in. Perfect for storage and travel. I rate this item a five 'cause I can't rate it a six!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Mcgugan

customer_reviews.title: I won’t choose another.
customer_reviews.text: Shopping around you can see there’s a lot to choose from. I chose this paddle for its promised lightweight, strength, and portability. When I was able to use the paddle, it was very comfortable, worked just as I imagined, and for being a 3-piece, straight - not wobbly. The customer service that the company wants to provide was an unintended add on. They emailed me asking if it was “perfect” and wanted to know immediately if it was less than perfect. Most companies don’t go to that length; they typically go for “good enough.”
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice paddles ... can’t wait to get them in the water.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged neatly, arrived on time “next day” they look incredible and fit together nicely. I can’t imagine anyone would find fault with these. I looked at REI and they only had two to choose from. Neither came close to Super Paddles and cost 3 times as much. I bought two for less than 1 at REI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddle For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: awesome paddle for the money, super light weight. wish it came with a bag , that was the only disappointment. the heading advertised "with bag" but after i received it I checked online and the trim I got didn't include a bag. I just grabbed one on Amazon for a 3 piece paddle for $15 and it fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lobsterboy1984

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap and bolt fell out in the lake but it’s fine
customer_reviews.text: Used this for most of the season and the function is pretty good. It feels like a cheap paddle but works great for packing up and paddling around the lake. One of the bolts on the paddle did come off which was super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Najduk

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great additional paddle
customer_reviews.text: Really like this adjustable paddle for friends to use or second paddle for myself. It is lightweight and has been great paddling with. My standard paddle is quickblade/fixed.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Best Super paddle yet, worthy of your purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have used several of their paddles, this being the 4th. This is my favorite one, they have made some very good changes to the paddle that really add to the experience. Paddle is light, does not flex, and it is light and feels great in my hand. I give this paddle 5-stars. The price of this as compared to say the Hippo Stick, hundreds of dollars lower. DO you need a $450-$600 paddle or will a $200 paddle do just fine? I am going with the Super 12k Carbon.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T. Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have just recently purchased this paddle so I have not used it a lot but it is really lightweight, which is very nice. It is also nice that it breaks down into 3 pieces making it easy to transport. It seems to be of good quality but again I have not used it for a very long. So far, so good. It came with a case which is also very nice. I look forward to trying it out more and I hope it will hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: K.RowD

customer_reviews.title: A mixup..,
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 identical paddles(fiberglass version) Disappointed that they are drilled differently for the assembly clips. I mixed up the two handle parts, and found out I had a paddle that wouldn't assemble. Ruined my day on the water... Had to return home to get 2nd paddle. Don't you use a jig to standardize manufacturing???
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Love this Super Paddle!
customer_reviews.text: Love this SUP paddle- arrived almost before I ordered it, packed great. After having my Costco SUP aluminum/plastic paddle break after 2 uses, I studied various paddle options, and decided on this Super Paddle. It is well constructed, sturdy and so good looking, I had to hang it on a cedar post in our living room! Nice flex, and very unlikely to break like the plastic-aluminum handle paddles. The storage paddle bag is well made and just icing on the cake. Steve G Vashon, Wa
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gering

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle, nice case, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this mostly to lakes and twice to ocean waters. Despite this being a split paddle you would never know it or feel flex as a result of the two pieces coming together. My biggest trouble with this paddle is disconnecting the main two pieces halfway down the oar. When any moisture is present it is nearly impossible to twist them apart. I am ok with this as I feel it is a sign of precision manufacturing and very little play between the two pieces when they are connected. When the paddle drys fully, they easily come apart.
customer_reviews.author: drew siegrist

customer_reviews.title: sturdy paddle
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but I'm impressed so far. The paddle fin is stronger than I was expecting -- I was a little worried it would feel too flimsy, but it's pretty solid. We have tall people in our family so we'll need it extended pretty far. Hoping it will be strong enough. It seems well made. I love that it came packaged in brown paper (which I will repurpose for wrapping paper) instead of bubble wrap. We're looking forward to using our new paddle board and I think this paddle will be great!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Awsome paddle great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got my paddle today. It's well made very light comes in three pieces easy to put together it's very adjustable and comes with a nice case for everything. You will not be disappointed if you buy I'm very happy with my new paddle
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schmo

customer_reviews.title: Very well made paddle.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2 and what I like most about this paddle is how it feels like a single piece. There is not flexing at the joints. The quick adjust doesn't interfere with my hand placement like some others I've tried. I'm very happy with this paddle.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be good quality, good value, great customer follow up from small business. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to have more durable paddles for friends to use while paddle boarding on our lake, so as to not break our more expensive carbon fiber paddles. These shipped quickly, well padded with nice carry case, and work well. Only used them a couple of times, so can't comment on durability, other than to say they appear well made and I expect no problems. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: ParamotorPilot

customer_reviews.title: Good overall paddle
customer_reviews.text: Great Looking paddle, light, good price. Casual paddler no problems, easy set up, great case that i won't be using because it to much to take apart every use I think. It paddles great, though I have only used one other brand, easy adjust .
customer_reviews.author: Natan Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Like adding a turbo to your motor!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! My normal round trip around this little island is 40 minutes. With this CF bamboo veneer paddle it took 30 minutes. Its astonishing how much better it is. I will probably add some grip tape in 2 spots but wow....great product. I was hesitant on the price point but will never go back to lesser paddles now. I am 6 foot 1 and 200 lbs using an inflatable sup.
customer_reviews.author: BobC

customer_reviews.title: Bit on the heavy side, but I knew that ...
customer_reviews.text: Bit on the heavy side, but I knew that going in. Just using it for airplane travel. Did not want to invest in carbon in case of damage or theft by handlers. The shaft takes in a little water but that is expected Manufacturer suggests spraying WD-40 on joining areas to displace the H2O.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Best paddle I've used
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth paddleboard paddle and the best by far. Excellent build. Lightweight. Easy to adjust. Mostly for ocean paddleboarding. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Silomi

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Just got off the water trying my new paddle. It was easy to put together. Good solid fit, no slop. Easy to adjust while on the paddle board. Nice handle. Lightweight. We have lots of visitors who always want to try to SUP so having an easy adjustable paddle was a must. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, reliable stick for big people.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome paddle. I am 6’-5” and 270 lb. I paddle surf in hawaii and have to really strike to get the waves. No problem. Keep it salt free and don’t try and shorten stick while water is in the stick, may cause issues with the pin locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Well Made, super light and excellent carrying case - does exactly what it says. The head isn't big but as long as you're aware of that it is otherwise very well made and works great. I've used it about ten times now and it shows no sign of wear or otherwise..great little piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: T. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not for short people
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a good paddle for the price. I'm 5'1 and didn't realize the adjustable height would be an issue. It's on the lowest setting when I stand. If I kneel on the board, I am not able to condense the paddle any further. I need a smaller option.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: Nice paddle
customer_reviews.text: Nice paddle, that is adjustable so it's easy to use for travel. I have a inflatable SUP, and this paddle breaks down to fit in the bag with my board. It also adjusts when put together, which is nice. I am able to shorten it or lengthen it depending on if I'm standing up or sitting on my board.
customer_reviews.author: AK Beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Super strong--go faster with less effort
customer_reviews.text: I noticed an instant difference from the stock aluminum paddle that came with my board. This one lets me go faster with putting in less effort.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: UNSAFE AND NOT CARBON FIBER.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT trust this paddle. The quick release at the top is cheap plastic, and does not hold the paddle secure. Cost cutting for sure. The seller is lying to you in the description. The description says carbon fiber, but it says fiberglass ON THE PADDLE. BS. I would not want to depend on this paddle if I went out into open water.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT last!
customer_reviews.text: Started out really liking this paddle out of the box... until after a few easy uses one of the screws on the lever-lock popped out. It then began to rust, even though we wash it and dry it after use just like we do with our board... disappointed that I paid so much for a paddle I thought was going to be nice just for it turn out to not be as good as one from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Diver-Man

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that I can take it apart and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased three of these paddles. I have three because I lost 4 others. I like the fact that I can take it apart and keep it in the carrying case. I haven't lost a single one of these. A good buy for a quality paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Rae R. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Just as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Great compact and light paddle, but it’s very strong too. Easy to assemble and store.
customer_reviews.author: K S Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good paddle, but metal piece broke fairly quickly. But company fixed
customer_reviews.text: Good paddle, arrived quickly. Included a case that was totally unnecessary. Most of the logos on the blade came off quickly with use, but couldn't care. However, about 6 months after purchase, using probably 20 times in salt water, the metal button that keeps the two halves of connected rusted and fell apart. I now use a little bamboo stick shoved in the hole, which does not work as well. Update: I contacted the company and they mailed a replacement piece free of charge. Very quick and responsive
customer_reviews.author: JCWall

customer_reviews.title: Good quality 3 piece paddle with nice bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality paddle works well. It fits nicely into the pack for the inflatable board I use it with. The bag that comes with the paddle is of higher quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: SeanF

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised by how nice this 3 piece paddle handled in the water
customer_reviews.text: I wish the length adjustment system was slotted or squared so the paddle handle stayed true when changing lengths. Otherwise, I was pleasantly surprised by how nice this 3 piece paddle handled in the water. I paddle SUP alot, have many, many different paddles. This is not as comfortable as my nicest one piece, but is better than most of my other mid grade one piece paddles, which is actually saying alot!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Doty

customer_reviews.title: Easy, light and Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well made paddle. The connections are tight and the handle at the top is comfortable and solid. Also............. IT FLOATS!!!! Easily worth the money compared to more expensive paddles.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: I have been using an aluminum paddle and don't like the heaviness. My husband has a carbon fiber paddle and I like it but not the cost, so I decided to buy the Super Paddle carbon shaft with nylon blade. I love it. It is light weight and pulls the water well. Also the grip is a very comfortable design.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but does not work out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The paddle itself is nice, but the screws they use for the handle tention are to long, you can't use it with out replacing our shortening them
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wodzenski

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I ignored the poor reviews for this product thinking the paddle would be very nice BUT the paddle arrived completely scratched and banged up like it was previously used, a lot!!!!!! Also the handle and screws were missing???? You can't even use this product AND it looks terrible!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Adjusting bracket broke after two months
customer_reviews.text: It worked well at first, however, after 2 months of light use the plastic bracket used to adjust the height broke as the tightening bolts push directly into the plastic, there is no metal washer to distribute the pressure. In addition, the paint started peeling off, functionally ok, but esthetically unpleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Petko

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddle (SUP)
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described and I am not disappointed. Easy to put together. Adjustable so kids to a 6'5'' person can use it. It is actually not to heavy (some folks have complained about the weight)... I compared it to our graphite one and it is just a tad heavier. Nobody in our family brought up the weight (or any other issue) during use over the recent labor day weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Povilus

customer_reviews.title: Smaller in width
customer_reviews.text: The paddle is about a inch and a half smaller in width. Tough to see actual size in picture
customer_reviews.author: Jeff A.

customer_reviews.title: The reason that I am so satisfied with this product the Super Paddles customer support
customer_reviews.text: The reason that I am so satisfied with this product the Super Paddles customer support. I purchased this paddle - after 6 months of use the clip that connects the bottom part got rusty and fell off. The rest of the paddle was ok. Within a few weeks of some email correspondence with the company I received a completely new paddle - based on their guarantee. The paddle itself is light and the bag is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great product. After purchase I recieved an email from the company with information about themselves and the product. I also recieved a second follow up email as well. The paddle itself is well made and very sturdy. I have not noticed any operational issuse with the paddle after using it all summer. I would say it is a better paddle the one that came with our SUP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It fits in the cargo hull of my hybrid sup/kayak and is leight enough that my eight year old can hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Broken adjuster clamp
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 2 because the handle clamp to adjust it is broken. The top piece just slides up/down when using. I had to screw it on tight so it wouldnt move around, but now it's not adjustable. Would expect all the parts to function for a product of this price. Otherwise gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I use my paddleboard at the Jersey shore. The salt water & air beat up my ocean going stuff. So far, the paddle is holding up well. We'll see as time passes.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Fila

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying even if more on the expensive side
customer_reviews.text: It’s very lightweight and responsive in the water, which means less physical exertion is required to move about and manoeuvre. Although assembly is relatively straightforward, the shaft does require a bit of effort sometimes to either assemble or disassemble (perhaps this is because it is still new).
customer_reviews.author: fD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it's very lightweight, excellent design, and came when expected. Will do business with this cpany again. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bear

customer_reviews.title: High speed light weight with minimal effort
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and works amazing with my paddle board, gets high speed in the water with minimal effort
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews on this before making a purchase and was surprised some said it didn't float. That was the first thing I tried and it does float. Also yes it does take a little getting the screws to the right tightness but I brought a screw driver like the directions said and tightened as needed now I don't need too. Love this paddle!
customer_reviews.author: AARON LOVE

customer_reviews.title: All flex, all slip
customer_reviews.text: Whilst I know this paddle may seem appealing, do not fooled by friends for it has no traction. Great for beginners learning and children.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Grala

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddles for ISup 5 Stars!  Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Paddles are lightweight and built well. Used them primarily in ocean paddling. Simple to adjust and to breakdown and store. Fits in either its own storage bag, or in your own paddle board travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good strong paddle,light shaft with a heavy-ish blade
customer_reviews.text: Nice and tight joints and easy to adjust handle height. I did have to tighten the Philips screws a bit to get the clamp tight enough. Shaft seems very well built, light and strong. The nylon blade does feel a bit heavy making the paddle feel a little disproportionate weight wise but otherwise seems like a good overall paddle especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: making for a much more comfortable experience. The shaft weighs next-to-nothing
customer_reviews.text: Economical price for a paddle that weighs SO MUCH LESS than the one that came with our Xterra SUP package (great board, not-so-great paddle). This one will float, and the only weight is in the paddle face itself, making for a much more comfortable experience. The shaft weighs next-to-nothing, and the whole thing breaks down to fit in a snug and convenient case. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cypher

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Received last week and used twice over the weekend. Nice quality and lighter than my original paddle. Breaks down easily and comes with an excellent storage case. This is great, since I left my last paddle in tact over the winter. Couldn't adjust anymore due to salt water corrosion. The bag will force me to take it apart each time. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent paddle; definitely worth the $.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely lightweight and rigid. This makes a significant difference in the distance I can cover as well as my overall speed. I was concerned about spending so much on a paddle, but this was definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: The way the top handle attaches to the shaft is a bad design
customer_reviews.text: They rely on a clamp which is held in place by 2 philips head screws that can come loose and you can lose while paddling. They need to use a a better design to snap the handle to the main shaft of the paddle. I returned it and am looking for a better designed paddle. Everything else is good on this paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Monnie Brodbeck

customer_reviews.title: Love this Paddle
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I've used a ton paddles but of the ones I have tried this one is the best I've used. No flutter to speak of and it feels so smooth coming out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: ADK_Mailman

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally nice paddle
customer_reviews.text: Received my 3 pc alloy SUP paddle only two short days after placing my order !! Super quick delivery. Everything is as described. I feel this paddle is an exceptional product at a very low price and is very lightweight and well made. But it. You won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great paddle at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great paddle at an affordable price. It's light weight but sturdy and super comfortable to hold. I recently bought a paddle board that did not come with a paddle so I needed to purchase one and stumbled upon his one that had really great reviews. I figured I'd get this one based on the reputation and I have to say this paddle definitely lives up to the 5 star ratings. I tried it out for the first time yesterday and it performs just as well as some of the 250.00 paddles at a fraction of the cost. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann M.

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend but good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good looking paddle but it broke the first time I used it. Could have just been a fluke as there is always the chance of a defect in anything manufactured. Customer service was very good and they immediately provided a refund.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle for this price point!
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle for this price point! This is a sturdy paddle, and the 3 piece construction of the shaft is nice and solid with no wobbling at all. The top hand grip is very comfortable and the adjustable size marking on the pole are very convenient so you can quickly adjust the paddle to your favorite length. While I wish this paddle was as light as the more expensive carbon fiber paddles, this is an excellent paddle for the money. Overall, I highly recommend this paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight SUP paddle
customer_reviews.text: Great, lightweight SUP paddle. I seem to break paddles every year, and this one has held up. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: a-man

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle. Def floats
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle. Def floats. Stopped for a break and it went in. Floated and was easy to grab back out. Increased my stroke speed with this paddle. Two thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: JacqueK

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific paddle--sturdy, easy to put together and store. Great carrying case. Great value.So much better than other flimsy paddles in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne M Hinkey

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last...
customer_reviews.text: Would love someone to contact us, as the paddle is falling apart after 5-10 hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnye E.

customer_reviews.title: We liked it so much we immediately order a second one
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the first paddle to see how it would work compared to (clubs) that came with our SUPs. We liked it so much we immediately order a second one. The item seems well constructed. It arrived on time and well packaged. We are recreational paddlers and these paddles work very well for us.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Paddles are great for SUP and are easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Paddles are great for SUP and are easy to put together, carry and travel with and to store properly.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Mush

customer_reviews.title: pole snapped in two
customer_reviews.text: I used the paddle about 15 times. This morning while paddling against a mild wind, the pole snapped in two. Literately, up the creek without a paddle.
customer_reviews.author: rplanet

customer_reviews.title: Light and strong
customer_reviews.text: After converting to a carbon fiber paddle from an aluminum one I'm convinced this is much better. Lighter is better. The quality was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddle
customer_reviews.text: Received the Paddle in an partially open box, no damage to the paddle its self. Good paddle to use as a Primary or secondary paddle. Great paddle for the price. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

product_meta.title: Carbon Fiber SUP Paddle - 3-Piece Adjustable Stand Up Paddleboard Paddles - Carbon Fiber Series
feature_bullets: ENDLESS FUN, ULTIMATE DURABILITY & PERFORMANCE - Whether you're cruising, grooving, touring, racing or surfing, you'll have a great time with our Fiberglass SUP paddle. Constructed with a fiberglass shaft, tough nylon blade, and stainless steel screws, our SUPER rugged standup paddle can endure serious punishment and is built to last. You'll have years of fun with this paddle.

EASILY ADJUSTABLE FOR ALL PADDLERS - Our 3-piece paddle is adjustable from 72 to 86 inches (1.82-2.19m), making it ideal for paddlers above the height of 5 feet. It takes under 20 seconds to setup and take apart your paddle.
FOCUS ON DESIGN & QUALITY - We designed the Fiberglass series as a high end entry-level paddle perfect for beginners and pros alike. No detail is too small for us when we design our paddles.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
